additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Our ingredients... When cooked: vegetables (74%) (contain sulphites) (carrot, onion, green bean, cabbage, celery, green pea, red capsicum), potato starch, salt, food acid (sodium citrate), maltodextrin, flavours, flavour enhancers (621, 635), sunflower oil, yeast extract, colour (turmeric), spice extract, herb extract.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Egg, May Be Present Peanuts, May Be Present Lupin, May Be Present Wheat, May Be Present Crustacea, May Be Present Tree Nuts, May Be Present Sesame, May Be Present Milk, May Be Present Fish, Contains Sulphites
